Form::isValid (  ) 

Checks if the entered Values in the Form are valid

Returns:
boolean sigifiing if form is filled with valid data

Definition at line 191 of file Form.php.

References $checker.

                            {
    $valid1 = true;
    foreach($this->inputfields as $input) {
      if(!$input->isValid()) {
        $valid1 = false;
      }
    }
    
    $valid2 = true;
    foreach($this->checker as $checker) {
      $checker->setForm($this);
      if(!$checker->check()) {
        $valid2 = false;
      }
    }
    return $valid1 && $valid2;
  }
